class.name: B4R::B4RCONTROLLINO
class.comment: A library for the Controllino Mega RTC Changelog 20240321: NEW 20240328: Added more RTC functions, RTC Alarm Functions, RS485 functions, and defined Controllino Pin names java -jar B4Rh2xml.jar rControllino.h rControllino.xml

method.name: Init
method.comment: Initialize the RTC

method.name: SetTimeDate
method.comment: Set the RTC Date and Time

method.name: GetDay
method.comment: Get the Day Returns day 01 - 31, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetWeekDay
method.comment: Get the Weekday Returns weekday 00 - 06, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetMonth
method.comment: Get the Month Returns month 01 - 12, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetYear
method.comment: Get the Year Returns year 00 - 99, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetHour
method.comment: Get the Hour Returns hours 01 - 12, or 00 - 23 (depending of 12H/24H mode), or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetMinute
method.comment: Get the Minutes Returns minutes 00 - 59, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: GetSecond
method.comment: Get the Seconds Returns seconds 00 - 59, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: SetTimeDateStrings
method.comment: Set the Date and Time by defining the time and date by strings, e.g. "Nov 15 2018", "11:41:02"

method.name: RTC_SPI_SLAVE_PIN_INIT
method.comment: Initialization of the SPI slave select pin for the RTC chip (RV-2123) For experienced users only. Returns 0 when succeeded, or -2 if there is not selected proper CONTROLLINO board

method.name: RTC_SPI_SLAVE_PIN_CONTROL
method.comment: Control of SPI slave select pin for the RTC chip (RV-2123) mode 0 for RTC chip SPI bus disable, 1 for RTC SPI bus enable Returns 0 when succeeded, -1 for unsupported mode, or -2 if there is not selected proper CONTROLLINO board

method.name: RS485Init
method.comment: Initialization of the RS485 bus Serial3 still needs to be initialized separately. This only inits RE and DE pins. Always returns 0

method.name: RS485Init_with_BaudRate
method.comment: Initialization of the RS485 bus with baudrate Always returns 0

method.name: RS485TxEnable
method.comment: Enable RS485 bus trasmission

method.name: RS485RxEnable
method.comment: Enable RS485 bus reception

method.name: SwitchRS485RE
method.comment: Control of RS485 bus RE signal mode 0 for RS485 Receive Enable Active, 1 for Receive Enable Inactive Returns 0 when succeeded, -1 for unsupported mode

method.name: SwitchRS485DE
method.comment: Control of RS485 bus DE signal mode 0 for RS485 Data transmission Enable Inactive, 1 for Data transmission Enable Active Returns 0 when succeeded, -1 for unsupported mode

method.name: PrintTimeAndDate
method.comment: Reads time and date from RTC chip and prints it on serial line This function expects that the serial line was initialized before calling it. Format is DD/MM/YY HH:MM:SS Returns seconds 0, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: ClearRTCAlarm
method.comment: Clears alarm interrupt on the RTC chip (RV-2123) Returns 0 when succeeded, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before

method.name: SetRTCAlarm
method.comment: Configures an alarm on the RTC chip (RV-2123) aHour: 01 - 12, or 00 - 23 (depending of 12H/24H mode) aMinute: minutes 00 - 59 Returns 0 when succeeded, or -1 if the RTC library was not initialized before
